level.heading: INTERCONNECTION REQUESTS, FEES, AND FORMS (ยง 15-4001)

level.text: Interconnection customers seeking to interconnect a small generator facility shall submit an interconnection request using a standard form approved by the Commission to the electric distribution company (“EDC”) that owns the electric distribution system to which interconnection is sought. The EDC shall establish processes for accepting interconnection requests electronically.
The Commission shall determine the appropriate interconnection fees, and the fees shall be posted on the EDC’s website and listed in the electric utility’s tariffs.

In circumstances where standard forms and agreements are used as part of the interconnection process defined in this document, electronic versions of those forms shall be approved by the Commission and posted on the EDC’s website.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: As amended by Final Rulemaking published at 56 DCR 1415, 1418 (February 13, 2009).
